DataElement.preferredName: Finding PSA Measurement and Clinical Response Agreement Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the findings for prostate specific antigen (PSA) and the clinical response are in agreement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Finding Prostate Specific Antigen Measurement And Clinical Response Agreement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._The determination of the prostate specific antigen present in a sample._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._An evaluation of the clinical response of the disease to the therapy._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Objective evidence of disease perceptible to the examining physician (sign) and subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient (symptom).

Concepts.definition: Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.

Property.preferredName: Prostate Specific Antigen Measurement And Clinical Response Agreement
Property.preferredDefinition: The determination of the prostate specific antigen present in a sample.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:An evaluation of the clinical response of the disease to the therapy.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

Concepts.definition: The determination of the prostate specific antigen present in a sample.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
An evaluation of the clinical response of the disease to the therapy.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Dr. Turkbey P173316 request 11.21.17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.
